name: ADELMA
description: In the City of the Dead, the player is a traveler that is walking around and solving puzzles and myths left in this empty city. Once the player is dead, the game will start over from the beginning as a dead person. In addition, the truth of the city will only be unveiled after realizing the player himself or herself is dead. The winning condition for the player to escape the city is after death and find the only exit in the city.
